channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache StreamPipes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache StreamPipes

item.title: CVE-2024-29868|2024-06-24T09:59:39.941Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20streampipes
item.description:
Use of Cryptographically Weak Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG) vulnerability in Apache StreamPipesÂ user self-registration and password recovery mechanism. This allows an attacker to guess the recovery token in a reasonable time and thereby to take over the attacked user's account. This issue affects Apache StreamPipes: from 0.69.0 through 0.93.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 0.95.0, which fixes the issue.
